website_summaries.verdict: Older styling blends with traditional decor.
cons: Many reports of table arriving dented or broken

customer_reviews.title: Really nice table that I'm using as a desk in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table that I'm using as a desk in my garage for my ebay business. It's solid. I actually cut 4" of the legs and put casters on them. My low rating is a warning for those who intend to use it in their kitchen. The table is big, heavy and ships by UPS. The UPS guy didn't seemed thrilled about carrying it. The table top had a marble size dent in the top surface. I can't imaging returning the thing after unboxing it. But as a desk in my garage, not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opened the box and one of the boards was broken in half
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, but when I opened the box I on of the white boards under the table top was snapped in half where a screw was holding it to the table top. I don't think this happened during shipping so if was very frustrating. I was able to buy buy a new bbn board and fix it myself but it was frustrating that I had to repair a brand new table.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Krug

customer_reviews.title: Packaged Nicely and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived quickly and was a breeze to assemble. It took me longer to open the box than it took to attach the legs to the table top. It is sturdy and a nice height. It is a little taller than our last table which I like because there is less chance to drop food on my shirt! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Slothful Lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table, scratches easily.
customer_reviews.text: Overall beautiful product. We bought the matching. Benches and we are in love. We did find that it scratches incredibly easy though. Not sure if we got a dud or if the finish they use is extremely thin. I’m talking a plastic cup slid across it and it left a nice long surface level scratch. We use place mats now to combat it, but after only a week of use it looked like it had been used for a year with the amount of scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and in perfect condition. I was hesitating on getting this but I wanted inexpensive and something I can change color wise to match my beach decor room. This set was perfect fit and very well made
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very solid and easy to put together. Using for kitchen prep table. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lois L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long narrow rooms.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of Farm Table's, THEY are long and narrow, different from the " normal shape " of kitchen/ dinning tables.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: The table packaging was damaged and torn. There was a hairline cracked on the table side and a quarter size dent on table. Overall, it's a nice table for the price. Delivery time was excellent and installing table legs was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Office Ready!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Using the table as a desk in my office!
customer_reviews.author: fran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect!! Just what I was looking for. Good value and simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Came with a divot in the wood on table top ...
customer_reviews.text: Came with a divot in the wood on table top but did not notice until after it was assembled. Was too much hassle to disassemble, box back up and return. Put a runner over top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, makes condo homey. Now see how long it lasts. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Cosgrave

customer_reviews.title: Ugly, cheap-looking table
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed in this table. The legs are skinny and cheap-looking, the top is ugly and cheap-looking, and to top it off, the damn thing is too high. I'm 6 feet tall, and even I found the table to be too high. I strongly recommend you skip this awful table.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice table, different than the order, but will keep it.
customer_reviews.text: Just received as a gift. Sturdy table, but not as pictured. Legs and skirting not white, and legs are straight, not turned. Box says shaker style not farmhouse. I wanted to change this review to 4 stars. The table is great, and the only reason I gave 3 initially was the surprise of it not being what was ordered. That being said, it is a super study and pretty table. So really only one star off for being different than what was ordered. I will be keeping it though. :)
customer_reviews.author: Marci Aurila

customer_reviews.title: This is a really beautiful table and is of a decent size
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful table and is of a decent size. Mine arrived with a dime-sized dent on one side - from reading other reviews, I had expected the table to arrive with some wear from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Priya T

product_meta.title: Boraam Farmhouse Table, White/Natural
product_meta.description: The Farmhouse Table in White and Natural from Boraam Industries features... Ready To Assemble construction (RTA): all tools are included making assembly easy as 1, 2, 3.. Constructed with solid hardwood. 36" x 60" Table top . Total weight is 72 pounds. Turned table legs gives a classic look and added stability.. Boraam Industries was established in 2001 and is renowned for quality furniture in a classic, casual style. Boraam provides well-styled, high-quality home furnishings and furniture at affordable prices. Their highly qualified team comes with many years of experience in the furniture industry and the result is elegant classical and contemporary designs at a very reasonable price. From bar stools to pub tables, baker's racks to dinette sets and much, much more-Boraam Industries will have what you're looking for. Recommended for residential use only.
feature_bullets: Ready To Assemble construction (RTA): all tools are included making assembly easy as 1, 2, 3!
Turned table legs gives a classic look and added stability!
Warranty and support only available for products purchased directly from authorized retailers. See website for details

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars25 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
